_88Profile.description: Profile represents a registered Account's Public Info
_88Profile.title: Profile

___URL.description: URL associated with the profile. Will be prepended with “http://” if not present. Maximum of 100 characters.

___Description.description: A description of the user owning the account. Maximum of 160 characters.

___LinkColor.description: Sets a hex value that controls the color scheme of links used on the authenticating user’s profile page on twitter.com. This must be a valid hexadecimal value, and may be either three or six characters (ex: F00 or FF0000).

___Location.description: The city or country describing where the user of the account is located. The contents are not normalized or geocoded in any way. Maximum of 30 characters.

___Id.description: The unique identifier for a Account's Profile

___ScreenName.description: Full name associated with the profile. Maximum of 20 characters.

_88Config.description: Config represents the required options for this module to work
_88Config.title: Config

___Postgres.description: Postgres holds the all credentials for postgres db connection.
___Postgres.title: Postgres

___Password.description: Password holds the password for the postgres

___DBName.description: DBName holds the database name for the postgres

___Port.description: The port number for postgres config

___Username.description: Username holds the username for the postgres

___Host.description: Host holds the hostname for the postgres
